name: Driving Home for Christmas
description:
Its Christmas and time to go home to your family! Drive quick, get those gifts and dont hit the deer!

Warning: A lot of deer were harmed while making this game!

  • Unlock levels and cars with achievements!
  • Use WASD for controlling the car
  • Use spacebar key to boost
  • Use escape key to open the menu
  • (partial controller support, not in the menu).
